mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ireview) FROM review WHERE iuser = #{iuser} and ipayment = #{ipayment}
SELECT P.iusers FROM product P JOIN payment pa ON p.iproduct = pa.iproduct WHERE PA.ipayment = #{ipayment}

SELECT COUNT(R.ireview) as countIre, U.rating from product P JOIN payment PA ON P.iproduct = PA.iproduct JOIN review R ON R.ipayment = PA.ipayment JOIN user U ON U.iuser = P.iusers AND R.rating IS NOT NULL and R.rating > 0 WHERE P.iusers = #{iuser}
